sections.content: Bucks Run 2.5 km ski trail will be groomed for skate and classic skiing today, January 17, 2025.  There is an additional $5 daily trail fee for the use of Bucks Run or annual permits are available for $125.  Dogs and walkers are not permitted on our groomed trails.

sections.header: Natural Snow Classic and Skate Ski Trails
sections.content: – Trails were unable to be groomed today, January 17, 2025 due to limited snowfall.  You are always welcome to come out and blaze your own trail.

sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Open this weekend January 18th and 19th from 10 a.m. until 5 p.m. (final rental at 4 p.m.) Ski rentals can be booked ahead https://www.metroparks.com/stony-creek-metropark/#cross-country_skiing.  Trails will not be groomed at this time.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Perfect conditions for skating and classic on Bucks Run. Golf course is not groomed and no info on whether it will be before the weekend.

Stoney Creek Metropark (Shelby Township).conditions: They've finally got enough accumulation to make the golf course skiable. Used waxless rock skis and had a very nice time. Skied some in the woods, flats are doable but wouldn't try any hills, not enough snow yet.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Best conditions of the year on the upper Red and Blue loops ! Thank you Mother Nature , Nubs Nob , and John Baker . It was like skiing on butter .

nubsNob.liftsOpen: 7 Lifts, Space Worm and the Rope Tow
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails are open and in great shape. Trails will be power-tilled and tracked again this morning.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday through Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 PM. Extra night session Sunday, January 19 from 5:30 to 9:00 PM as well.
nubsNob.comments: All of the natural snow we received this week has been meticulously tilled into the base, and the result is nothing at which to shake a stick. We strongly advise gearing up and getting out for what should be a fantastic weekend on the snow. The lifts spin today from 9:00 AM to 9:00 PM today with an hour break beginning at 4:30 to prepare for the night session. Make it a grand day at Nub's Nob.
